# MACaptionAppearanceFontStyle.casual

**Case**

The font style preferred for the casual font style.

## Declaration

```swift
case casual
```

## Constants

- **MACaptionAppearanceFontStyle.default**: The default font style for all caption text.
- **MACaptionAppearanceFontStyle.monospacedWithSerif**: The font style preferred for the monospaced serif font style.
- **MACaptionAppearanceFontStyle.proportionalWithSerif**: The font style preferred for the proportional serif font style.
- **MACaptionAppearanceFontStyle.monospacedWithoutSerif**: The font style preferred for the monospaced sans serif font style.
- **MACaptionAppearanceFontStyle.proportionalWithoutSerif**: The font style preferred for the proportional sans serif font style.
- **MACaptionAppearanceFontStyle.cursive**: The font style preferred for the cursive font style.
- **MACaptionAppearanceFontStyle.smallCapital**: The font style preferred for the small capital font style.
